## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT4G16500](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT4G16500)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>AtCYS4, CYS4</u>
- **Gene Name:** phytocystatin 4
- **Description:**   Cystatin/monellin superfamily protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2130709
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
